long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Save, Search, Organize and sync your saved pages across browsers.

Notch allows you to save the pages that interest you and then quickly find them later using our search engine. It is available as a chrome extension. It is built with simplicity and functionality in mind. Everything is just a few keystrokes away. 

It helps you find the bookmarks that you are looking for by indexing the entire contents of the page. This allows you to search for almost anything on the page and immediately find the page you are looking for. All the pages that you save get automatically synced. Never lose any of your pages again!

- Save unlimited pages
- Search across the contents of your page even when you're offline
- Sign In with your email ID to sync your pages across browsers
- Clean and intuitive user interface
- It's free

How to save a page?
There are multiple ways! Right-click on any page and hit the "Save this Page to Notch" option. Or if you want to enter a custom description about your page click on the notch icon on your extension toolbar icon in the top right corner of your browser and then click the "Save this page" button.

How to search through my saved pages?
Press Ctrl + Shift + S to open up the notch search page and perform a simple search. Alternatively, click on the notch icon in the extension toolbar, then click the "Search (Ctrl + Shift + S)" button at the bottom to open the search page.

Where can I see all of my saved pages?
Click on the notch icon in the extension toolbar, then click the "Knowledge" button at the bottom to open the list of all saved pages.


Search works across the following fields:
- URL
- Page Title
- Content
- User-provided description text
